1. Created `/tmp/config_utils.py` with `get_scope()` function that returns "/etc/"
2. Created `/tmp/cleanup_logic.py` with `get_op()` function that returns a command to find and delete .conf.bak files

All files are in place and ready to be used. The script will:
1. Change directory to /etc/ (from config_utils.get_scope())
2. Execute the cleanup command (from cleanup_logic.get_op()) to delete all .conf.bak files in that directory tree

Note: The script will need execute permissions (chmod +x) if you want to run it directly as a shell script.
